title: Glitch - Can't Move, No Lag
body: I've been getting a really frustrating bug where my champ freezes and I sometimes also can't use abilities. It's no lag, my ping doesn't spike at all and I can see movement of creeps/champions and receive damage in real-time like normal. I thought it was my mouse and keyboard because they're so old, but in a game today a Kalista on the other team was having the same issue (obviously a huge issue for her passive in particular). I thought it would be worth posting to see how many people are affected by this and if it is something that needs to be addressed. It's extremely frustrating when you're about to escape, or just farming, or tower diving, and then you freeze and die in a stupid way and then get flamed.

replies.body:
I am having the same problem since a few days ago. Clicking to move the character does not register an in-game move consistently.  If I ping/tracert that IP address I get time outs. 

Here is the link for the tracert 
http://pastebin.com/qXtYezKR

Also, the ICSI report: http://n2.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/summary/id=36ea240d-10141-513811ac-bcf9-40b9-84c8

I've checked on my Ubuntu installation and I can't ping or tracert that IP either. I tried contacting the ISP and they said nothing is wrong. I checked the ports on the router and they seem to be okay.
anecdotally, it seems to be since the last big patch that i have had this problem
I played with more people today who are having this issue. It's definitely not just me.
Please link them to this thread and get them to follow the instructions. The more information, the easier it will be to figure out the problem.

Hey there,

Could you do the following for me.

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text and reply back with them here (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this)
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and email your results to oce-wrenchmen@googlegroups.com.

I have a problem similar to this
i have 40-50 ping 
I can move freely cant attack
when minions die they stay there attacking other dead minions i take damage even tho i have run away from a fight and sometimes it will unglitch and i will be dead
today i played a game of aram and my heath depleted and i could still move then it unfroze and it told me i was dead
Please help me

I did some more investigation. It turns out to be a mouse issue. My clicks aren't registering with LOL full screen because of the mouse. If I use 'A' (attack-move) I can move fine. If I reassign move from MB2 to another key I can move. I tried reinstalling my mouse drivers but to no avail (maybe it is a Windows issue?).

Same thing has happened to me.  Cost me 40 LP today because my character just freezes in the middle of the lane, and I watch him get murdered full time.  I'm not lagging, I have 40 ping.   I can type.  I just cant move, fight, use summoners, any abilities, or items.  I can move my camera around the map. This needs to be fixed.  It is not a connection issue on my end.
